job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to architect the future of education? As a Senior Software Engineer at our cutting-edge EdTech company, you'll be the mastermind behind AI-powered learning experiences that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge. If you're a technical virtuoso who thrives on autonomy, strategic thinking, and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in education technology, this is your stage.

   Imagine bringing historical figures to life in a TikTok-style app, crafting personalized magical stories that boost comprehension, or developing an AI learning copilot that integrates seamlessly with existing platforms. These aren't just ideas - they're our products, and you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution.

   We're not interested in following trends - we're setting them. Our AI-first approach means you'll be freed from mundane tasks to focus on high-impact decisions and innovative problem-solving. If you're ready to lead the charge in transforming education through technology, we're ready for you.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect the Future: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features that will shape the long-term trajectory of our EdTech products.
     * Drive Innovation: Leverage cutting-edge AI technologies to create unprecedented learning experiences, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in education.
     * Lead Technical Strategy: Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability, collaborating closely with product teams to align features with ambitious goals.
     * Ensure Excellence: Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues to deliver a seamless experience for thousands of learners.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Chasing fleeting tech trends or juggling short-term projects with no lasting impact.
     * Wasting your talents on internal IT systems or outsourced projects that don't directly enhance learning experiences.
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or wrestling with mundane infrastructure issues.
     * Following a rigid, pre-defined roadmap without the opportunity to influence product direction.
     * Working in isolation - your expertise will be valued, and your voice will be heard in shaping our products' future., Drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered EdTech products, ensuring they are scalable, innovative, and capable of delivering transformative learning experiences to thousands of students worldwide.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Ready to architect the future of education? As a Senior Software Engineer at our cutting-edge EdTech company, you'll be the mastermind behind AI-powered learning experiences that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge. If you're a technical virtuoso who thrives on autonomy, strategic thinking, and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in education technology, this is your stage.

   Imagine bringing historical figures to life in a TikTok-style app, crafting personalized magical stories that boost comprehension, or developing an AI learning copilot that integrates seamlessly with existing platforms. These aren't just ideas - they're our products, and you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution.

   We're not interested in following trends - we're setting them. Our AI-first approach means you'll be freed from mundane tasks to focus on high-impact decisions and innovative problem-solving. If you're ready to lead the charge in transforming education through technology, we're ready for you.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect the Future: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features that will shape the long-term trajectory of our EdTech products.
     * Drive Innovation: Leverage cutting-edge AI technologies to create unprecedented learning experiences, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in education.
     * Lead Technical Strategy: Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability, collaborating closely with product teams to align features with ambitious goals.
     * Ensure Excellence: Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues to deliver a seamless experience for thousands of learners.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Chasing fleeting tech trends or juggling short-term projects with no lasting impact.
     * Wasting your talents on internal IT systems or outsourced projects that don't directly enhance learning experiences.
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or wrestling with mundane infrastructure issues.
     * Following a rigid, pre-defined roadmap without the opportunity to influence product direction.
     * Working in isolation - your expertise will be valued, and your voice will be heard in shaping our products' future., Drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered EdTech products, ensuring they are scalable, innovative, and capable of delivering transformative learning experiences to thousands of students worldwide.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development of AI-powered learning experiences, including creating interactive historical figures, personalized stories, and an AI learning copilot. It highlights leveraging 'cutting-edge AI technologies' and 'generative models' (implied by the examples) to create 'unprecedented learning experiences'. The core responsibilities involve architecting and implementing scalable features, driving innovation with AI, leading technical strategy for AI products, and ensuring product stability and performance. This aligns strongly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems powered by generative AI.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Architect the Future: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features that will shape the long-term trajectory of our EdTech products' directly relates to building and maintaining software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement scalable, maintainable features

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI technologies to create unprecedented learning experiences

job_tasks.phrase: Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues to deliver a seamless experience' describes operational aspects of keeping software and AI systems running smoothly in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitor and maintain product stability, fine-tune performance, and proactively identify and resolve issues

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'collaborating closely with product teams to align features with ambitious goals' indicates an understanding of business objectives and aligning technical work with them.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborating closely with product teams to align features with ambitious goals

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered EdTech products, ensuring they are scalable, innovative, and capable of delivering transformative learning experiences' encompasses the software engineering effort required for product development.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive the technical evolution of our AI-powered EdTech products
